website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate laundry detergent that quickly eliminates even the toughest odors and stains.
pros: Bottle is half the size of comparable laundry detergent bottles but provides the same number of washes
Includes baking soda that delivers a fresh scent time and time again
Contains special agents that trap soil in the wash water and ensures it won't redeposit onto your clothes
Intended for use with high-efficiency and all types of washers
cons: Sometimes leaves a strange residue on clothing
Scent can be overwhelming at times

customer_reviews.title: Appears to work as well as the more expensive brands and it has a great fragrance....
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely purchase this again from Amazon. Being a guy that was not used to purchasing laundry supplies I ordered Tide and Arm & Hammer brand detergents to judge for myself and found out that this brand was much lower in cost per ounce that the other and worked for me just as well as the Tide worked in cleaning our clothes... Now looking for a reasonable price with a quality fabric softener that infuses our clothes with a pleasant smell...
customer_reviews.author: Stingingfork

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE another major laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the smell and cleanliness of this detergent, along with the price. I LOVE another major laundry detergent, but it is always $5-$6 higher. I decided to try the Arm and Hammer and am very glad I did. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: 1mommyteacher

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: With a $2 online coupon, this was a great buy! Does it work as well as Tide's most expensive detergent? Maybe not. But it's as good as most others if not better. I always use a little Oxy-Clean in the load. Combined with this.......super clean laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cary

customer_reviews.title: Will not order this through the mail again
customer_reviews.text: As you can see the detergent leaked out and has a slight crack on the side I'm sure they threw this box around some....I tried to return it but theres no way to do so....I only ordered this because my daughter moved away and I like to mail her packages as shes just starting out ....I'm not happy with this ....arm & hammer is a great product as I have sensitive skin and this detergent I do not have problems with.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. I have sensitive skin and other detergents make me break out. I used to buy the most expensive kind, but this is affordable, love the smell, and great for my sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: dh08

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective
customer_reviews.text: I wear compression socks and need to rinse them out every day. I have found this removes anything such as sweat blood or just miscellaneous items from the socks without a problem I would imagine it would work excellent in general washing of clothes but are use pods for that. Overall it’s fantastic and definitely brings the socks back to life every day. I’ve used other things but this seems to be most effective with blood and sweat
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: like wearing a funeral wreath
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered what I though was fragrance free - MY BAD! But I will rate the scent. It very feminine and floral, and a bit irritating to me. But it does a swell job cleaning and is a good value if scented is your thing. Not me! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Stazer

customer_reviews.title: works well and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on sale so thought I would try it. I have always been a Gain user but occasionally like to try different brands. It does clean very well and does have a nice smell but it doesnt last as long as Gain does. Not saying it is a bad soap, just like the Gain sent better and it is way longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie-- a blind shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just order it!
customer_reviews.text: Got an awesome deal with coupon! This is an inexpensive way to get very clean clothes that smell great, I was extremely impressed by this item was shipped in my pantry box....sealed with plastic. I had never seen that before, so thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Geekfamily2008

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is a bargain compared to other ones and seems to work well in our front loading washer. I ordered it using Prime Pantry to help fill up a box and it arrived with no issues. I use this for washing cycling clothing and it's much cheaper than Tide or comparable products. Scent is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: David Blankenburg

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a superior value!
customer_reviews.text: Arm & Hammer is one of the only brands laundry detergent I can use without breaking out into hives every day. This product stands the tests of time and continues to be a quality product at a superior value.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well. Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent. I've just ordered it via Amazon for the 1st time. Not too thrilled that they packed it with my food products. It leaked and the whole box smelled like perfume. Granted it was wrapped in plastic so just the bottle was covered in detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Kara R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Detergent
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent. It gets the clothes clean, smells fresh and is at a great price point. 4 stars due to some packaging malfunction. The pour inside the bottle disconnected. Luckily I was able to pour it (mostly) into our empty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I love this Washing Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this Washing Detergent. I am highly allergic to most laundry soaps and get a migraine from them. But, I am happy to say that this is not one that makes me have terrible symptoms from allergies. It has a nice smell too. It really cleans well also. I get the clean burst. I tried the one with Oxyclean and that does give me a headache. So, you guys that are sensitive like I am, this one is a good choice to try..
customer_reviews.author: Carolescorner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged, spilled and damaged other products in box.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon duck fan

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile, for the convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well (enough). Individual jugs of soap had an additional shrink wrap coating covering the bottle. Despite that, one jug did leak a very little bit of soap into the plastic film. A quick rinse after opening and all was well. Would, and will, buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Color-coded caps are a great help.
customer_reviews.text: Meant to buy unscented but picked wrong color cap. Still, the scent was barely noticeable and pleasant. The container was much larger than I expected so definitely a good value. Liquid detergent less messy than powdered and this one cleans clothes very well.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper Sacto

customer_reviews.title: My favorite detergent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected and smells great! I actually notice a difference in smell when I use other people's detergent, which I don't normally notice with most brands. I've been using this detergent for about a year, and it doesn't negatively affect my sensitive skin or leave those annoying grease stains other detergents do.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Container leaked laundry soap all over the whole order
customer_reviews.text: The large laundry soap container was not secured in the box. The lid opened and spilled liquid laundry soap all over everything. Additionally, the 7 bottles of Dawn dish soap were loose in the box and although shrink-wrapped, one lid opened and spilled the liquid soap down between the plastic bottle and the plastic wrap. Since nothing was secured in the box, the box was split open in several places. The other items were squashed be the heavy soap items. Over all this was quite a mess and NOT what I needed at the end of the work day EVER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Perfetti

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good smell, but...
customer_reviews.text: As a couple others have posted, even though they have stickers on these to prevent spills, one of the two I ordered still leaked into the box and onto the other bottle. It was only a very small spill, maybe not more than a couple ounces, but something that might want to be checked out. Other than that, the smell is good and the price is really cheap compared to others. We wash with cold water and it still cleans our clothes incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bussell

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging gast shipping did  ot leak was sealed well
customer_reviews.text: This laundry soap is the only soap my father in law likes and will not break him out. The packaging was great no leaks fast shippimg will buy more love the fresh smell thank u.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Mess wasn't too bad, but looked exactly like others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Seal broke during delivery. Mess wasn't too bad, but looked exactly like others have mentioned. Was hoping it wouldn't happen to me, but alas it did. Besides that this is a great product and it's the only detergent I use.
customer_reviews.author: Mentor

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Lol, works great but like many of the other posters it came with a broken cap, but luckily in a plastic bag, which had also been punctured.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Effective, nice, fresh smell and a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Arm & Hammer liquid detergent is a great detergent, especially good for direct application on stains. Nice fresh smell, but not perfumey. Not a bad deal either!
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent great value!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, cleans clothing well and without harsh ingredients that harm clothing! I order 15 bottles of this yearly if that tells you anything 😊. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: BookBroad

customer_reviews.title: Leaked during shipping
customer_reviews.text: This leaked inside the box it was shipped in. I sent to my daughter as part of a “care package “ and she had to clean detergent off of other items in the box. The tape on the top of the bottle looked very odd and not applied by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: Not the best smelling detergent.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this smell. It is slightly off-putting for laundry detergent. Otherwise, it seems to clean just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Low Suds Enough For Me
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value. I like the product, but I wanted a low suds product. I wish it were much lower in suds making.
customer_reviews.author: Little Walter

customer_reviews.title: leaking
customer_reviews.text: Bottle 3/4 full, top was loose some one used scotch tape to try to close it. Contents spilled all over other items in box. box appears to have been miss handled by UPS! This is not the first time this has happened with liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gym clothes and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love Arm & Hammer detergent. My family is very athletic and we all have those stinky gym clothes that never seem to get the smell out of them. I have tried all the big name products and all the "homie remedies" still nothing got rid of the smell. This product does and it is super affordable!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The Only Laundry Detergent We Use !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great laundry detergent : is concentrated, clothes come out of washer & dryer smelling fresh, a great value !
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Gore

customer_reviews.title: Arm and Hammer always gets the whites white and the colors great. It's also cheaper than the other brands
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats Arm and Hammer! I've tried the others, they end up breaking out my kids' skin, etc. Arm and Hammer always gets the whites white and the colors great. It's also cheaper than the other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Value for money...
customer_reviews.text: Value for money and the scent is excellent. Packaging came intact no leaks so that was awesome. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diva D

customer_reviews.title: Was shipped separate from other products which was a good thing as one of the containers leaked
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped separate from other products which was a good thing as one of the containers leaked. but love the producrt
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: great active cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: Lasts for many loads and you can even use less than they say because it is powerful, especially if you presoak a stain
customer_reviews.author: Julez

customer_reviews.title: I like the scent
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. I like the scent. I use 2 capfuls for extra large load as my large capacity washer is quite big. Be sure to use the appropriate amount as that will ensure your clothing is clearned to your satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this huge jug of detergent! It smells amazing and washes my clothes well. It also lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my Mother in a goodie box... :) all smiles!!
customer_reviews.author: GreenEnvy

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite detergent. Love the scent, and my clothes seem to be cleaner. Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great on odors and stains both
customer_reviews.text: Only detergent I'll use! Works great on odors and stains both!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shipes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite. The scent is greAt and it’s gentle on both whites and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good overall buy
customer_reviews.text: Soap spilled out of the containers but outside of that it it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: kory gill

customer_reviews.title: A nice fresh scent and good cleaning ability
customer_reviews.text: Scent is very pleasant and keeps clothes smelling fresh for days.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: A awesome product with great smell
customer_reviews.text: A awesome product with great smell. Transferred from tide to this product. Fairly happy with the product it cleans well smells fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Xitiz N.

customer_reviews.title: Lid not tight, Big mess in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Im disappointed, today, for the first time with my delivery. I opened the box to find the cap on the detergent had not been tighten down before shipping. Not everything was damaged because thankfully it was a slow leak. The 3 boxes of Honey nut Cheerio were mush. I'm glad they have a sealed bag on the inside so I just had to find a container to put them in. The other things were washable. I usually don't complain about little stuff but this, I had to say something so in the future the lids will be checked for tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great price/performance.
customer_reviews.text: Actually works, unlike the off brands. Costs way less than Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Richards

customer_reviews.title: and is a fine detergent. Have used it
customer_reviews.text: Price is fabulous,, and is a fine detergent. Have used it previously
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me like a year. Great stuff, very potent and you only need about a half ounce for laundry, so it lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hollister

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my sawmill
customer_reviews.text: We use this to clean and lubricate or bandsaw sawmill blade, makes the lumber smell like laundry but take pine sap off the blade
customer_reviews.author: James A Reynolds III

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, really love Arm & Hammer products.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this detergent. Color is blue, clothes end up smelling nice and fresh and a little goes a long way. Appreciate Amazon's low prices.
customer_reviews.author: DiddyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laundry soap But if your going to buy it make sure it has oxiclean in it is totally the best. This works really good also love love it

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that my clothes are fresh and clean without having a scent to them. This produ t is also an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Great laundry detergent. But tape used to secure the lid is extremely difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: so o vbiously I ] think it is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only laundry detergent I use, so o vbiously I ] think it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I am quite happy with this purchase and will be reordering using Prime ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Arm and Hammer powdered detergent for years, but I ordered this on a whim and I am so pleasantly surprised! It lasted longer than I thought it would and is very effective. I am quite happy with this purchase and will be reordering using Prime Pantry!
customer_reviews.author: Kiowagus

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy; not good for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Such a strong scent/ fragrance. My son has a rash all over his body from this product. Very bad overall. Never buy this.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The package had leaked significantly in the box. The entire shipment of this and other items were covered in detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Jatounit

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: All the top names arm n hammer is just great for the price ! Works well, deep cleans and leaves a good scent..
customer_reviews.author: Jay Micale "Hawk" Professional Pool Player & Instructor for Daytonajay Billiards LLC, Retired ASE Master Auto Technician

customer_reviews.title: Arm and hammer
customer_reviews.text: It save me money and it does do what it do. I'm mother of 3 teens so more wash lol.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it makes my clothes smell as well as clean

customer_reviews.title: Arm and Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Always a great detergent and made even better by the price and the delivery on Amazon! Great deal!

customer_reviews.title: Why carry it home, great price

customer_reviews.title: Great price in the
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for years. Great price in the Pantry

customer_reviews.title: do not order
customer_reviews.text: cheap price but container leaks non returnable item plus I paid postage

customer_reviews.title: Not only best value but great fresh long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: Not only best value but great fresh long lasting scent. Bought as part of Amazon Prime Pantry....We may never buy bulky things in a store again...delivered and at the same price as retail....Prime Pantry is how we will shop for goods from now on.
customer_reviews.author: FlyFishinWishin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Glad they arrived with plastic to keep it from spilling. I’ve had several delivered with detergent all over the box. So I’m excited these were a great price and were wrapped well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product really packs some punch for the price. No need to spend double the price when this works just as great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J. Rollings

customer_reviews.title: I love this laundry detergent it whitens my whites and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent it whitens my whites and it gets the tough stains out leaving my laundry so fresh and so clean!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Actually messes up my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm switching back to the other brand. Ever since I use this I get a weird residue on my clothes. I don't know how to explain it, but It's to the point I couldn't get it off a set of pants right now. I'm sick of having to check clothes before ironing them. I don't get this with other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrRick

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Nice Smell
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Works great on stains, not watered down, and just the right amount of fragrance. I've been using this brand for a few years and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: I can buy what?  Online?
customer_reviews.text: Quality detergent at a really good price. My first box purchase. Will continue the practice.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my clothes come out looking clean and smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rosales

customer_reviews.title: it does a fantastic job and smells awesome
customer_reviews.text: As a life long Tide user, I only bought this when I had kids and the number of loads made it more cost efficient. However, it does a fantastic job and smells awesome.
customer_reviews.author: A. Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laundry detergent!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tough stains and delicates alike. A great product at a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Great soap not shipped right
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that there was soap everywhere leaking when I open both layers of plastic but after I wiped it down it was pretty awesome

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is okej..would have prefer not to pay as much

customer_reviews.title: Packaging for shipment poor
customer_reviews.text: One of the two laundry detergents got detergent all over I had to clean things up

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Clothes Smelling Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Arm & Hammer Clean Burst smells fresh and goes a long way — so you do not have to use as much.

customer_reviews.title: You can stand behind the Arm and Hammer name.
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for washing clothes. Have been a fan of this laundry soap for sometime. When I was a young homemaker I used many of Arm and Hamer's products throughout the years.

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent and value
customer_reviews.text: Best value I have found. No longer available in my area though

customer_reviews.text: Used to use this years ago. I don't know why I switched. Good laundry detergent.

customer_reviews.text: Smells so nice! Gets the stain out of my clothes, great price and lasts long for a household of 4. My youngest had demitis/ eczema so I was worried these would irritant his skin, but it hasn't! It's very gentle.

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Prime Pantry because it was much cheaper than at the store. Like this because it cleans my clothes well and doesn't leave an overwhelming scent on them.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love the clean burst scent ! Smells so good and it smells good coming out of the wash too ! Cleans very well!

customer_reviews.title: If you like strong smells
customer_reviews.text: Very, very fragrant. If you like strong smells, or if something is particularly smelly, definitely buy this stuff. The smell is a typical detergent smell, but x10.

customer_reviews.text: Easily works as well cleaning clothes as any of the "Big Name" brands. Cleans well and leaves a nice fresh smell to the clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong Tide user has converted for good to Arm & Hammer.

product_meta.title: ARM & HAMMER Clean Burst HE Liquid Laundry Detergent, 100 loads
product_meta.description:
The only detergent with the cleaning and freshening power of ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, our laundry detergent delivers the clean you need. It leaves clothes powerfully clean and naturally fresh, and is designed to power out dirt and odors. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses cleaner and is designed to work in both standard machines and today's energy conscious High Efficiency (HE) models. Special agents in the detergent trap the soil in the wash water, so it rinses away and doesn't redeposit on your clothes. Keeps your laundry smelling clean burst fresh and clean.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  User Manual [PDF ] 
 * Product Dimensions :6.31 x 7.63 x 11.4 inches; 10.7 Ounces
 * Date First Available :November 27, 2014
 * Manufacturer :AmazonUs/CHUW7
 * ASIN :B00Q8JJ23S

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars1,220 ratings The only detergent with the cleaning and freshening power of ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, our laundry detergent delivers the clean you need. It leaves clothes powerfully clean and naturally fresh, and is designed to power out dirt and odors. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses cleaner and is designed to work in both standard machines and today's energy conscious High Efficiency (HE) models. Special agents in the detergent trap the soil in the wash water, so it rinses away and doesn't redeposit on your clothes. Keeps your laundry smelling clean burst fresh and clean.
feature_bullets: Powers out tough dirt and odors
Leaves laundry smelling Clean Burst fresh and clean
Works in standard and High Efficiency (HE) models
With the freshening power of ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda
